titleStmt.title: Itinerarium totius Sacræ Scripturæ. Or, the trauels of the holy patriarchs, prophets, iudges, kings, our sauiour Christ, and his Apostles, as they are related in the Old and New Testaments. With a description of the townes and places to which they trauelled, and how many English miles they stood from Ierusalem. Also a short treatise of the weights, monies, and measures mentioned in the Scriptures, reduced to our English valuations, quantitie, and weight. Collected out of the workes of Henry Bunting, and done into English by R.B.
Itinerarium totius Sacræ Scripturæ. English
titleStmt.author: Bünting, Heinrich, 1545-1606.
R. B., fl. 1619.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
